MessageTemplate: An error occurred using the connection to database '{database}' on server '{server}'.

Properties.commandText: LOCK TABLE "__EFMigrationsHistory" IN ACCESS EXCLUSIVE MODE

CREATE TABLE "Users" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Username" text NOT NULL,
    "PasswordHash" text NOT NULL,
    "Role" integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Users" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "AK_Users_Username" UNIQUE ("Username")
);

CREATE TABLE "Chats" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Name" text NOT NULL,
    "OwnerID" bigint,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Chats" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_OwnerChat" FOREIGN KEY ("OwnerID") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT
);

CREATE TABLE "RefreshTokens" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "UserID" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Token" text NOT NULL,
    "IssuedAt" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "ExpiresAt" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_RefreshTokens" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_RefreshTokens_Users_UserID" FOREIGN KEY ("UserID") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT
);

CREATE TABLE "Messages" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "OriginID" bigint NOT NULL,
    "DestinationID" bigint,
    "isRead" boolean NOT NULL,
    "chatID" bigint,
    "ChatID" bigint,
    "Text" text NOT NULL,
    "Timestamp" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Messages" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Messages_Chats_ChatID" FOREIGN KEY ("ChatID") REFERENCES "Chats" ("ID") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Messages_Chats_chatID" FOREIGN KEY ("chatID") REFERENCES "Chats" ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Messages_Users_DestinationID" FOREIGN KEY ("DestinationID") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Messages_Users_OriginID" FOREIGN KEY ("OriginID") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT
);

CREATE TABLE "UserChatJoinTable" (
    "ChatID" bigint NOT NULL,
    "UserID" bigint NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_UserChatJoinTable" PRIMARY KEY ("ChatID", "UserID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_UserChatJoinTable_Chats_ChatID" FOREIGN KEY ("ChatID") REFERENCES "Chats" ("ID") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_UserChatJoinTable_Users_UserID" FOREIGN KEY ("UserID") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE "MessageReadUsers" (
    "MessageId" bigint NOT NULL,
    "UserId" bigint NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_MessageReadUsers" PRIMARY KEY ("MessageId", "UserId"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_MessageReadUsers_Messages_MessageId" FOREIGN KEY ("MessageId") REFERENCES "Messages" ("ID") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_MessageReadUsers_Users_UserId" FOREIGN KEY ("UserId") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
